title: Davis Scat Training Aid, 22 oz
features: Establish boundaries and help break bad urination habits
For use on off-limit areas like furniture, rugs, convertible car tops, garbage cans, trees and shrubs
Effective blend of natural Lemongrass, Thyme, Rosemary and Citronella oils with a touch of Menthol
Behavior modification tool to be used in conjunction with verbal command to stay away
Made in the USA for dogs and puppies
description: Davis Scat! is a training aid that helps keep pets from off-limit household items and helps to break urination habits. To use, spray on sofas, chairs, beds, rugs, convertible tops, garbage cans, trees, shrubs and other forbidden areas followed by a verbal command to stay away from the area. The blend of natural Lemongrass Oil, Menthol, Thyme Oil, Rosemary Oil and Citronella Oil is odorless to people when dried but not to pets. Repeated exposure to the Davis Scat! scent coupled with verbal commands and praise will correct the pet's unwanted behavior. Davis Scat! works through an association of this particular scent combined with the unpleasant experience of the dog getting scolded.
